Test Scenario: Verify new user can register with valid details
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /register
2. Fill in First Name, Last Name, Email, Phone, Password
3. Click Register button
4. Enter OTP code sent to email
5. Click Verify
Expected Result: User account is created successfully, user is logged in and redirected to home page

Test Scenario: Verify email OTP verification during signup
Test Steps:
1. Complete registration form with valid email
2. Submit the form
3. Check email for OTP code
4. Enter the 6-digit OTP code
5. Click Verify
Expected Result: OTP is validated, account is created, user is logged in

Pre-conditions: User is on OTP verification screen
Test Steps:
1. Click 'Resend Code' button
2. Wait for new email
3. Enter new OTP code
Expected Result: New OTP is sent to email, old OTP is invalidated

Test Scenario: Verify registration fails with existing email
Pre-conditions: Another user exists with same email
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /register
2. Enter existing email address
3. Complete other fields
4. Click Register
Expected Result: Error message: Email already registered

Test Scenario: Verify user can login with valid credentials
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter valid email and password
3. Click Login
Expected Result: User is logged in and redirected to home page

Test Scenario: Verify login fails with invalid password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter wrong password
4. Click Login
Expected Result: Error message: Invalid credentials

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Click Login
4. Enter 6-digit TOTP code from authenticator app
Expected Result: User is logged in after 2FA verification

Pre-conditions: User has 2FA enabled and backup codes
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /login
2. Enter valid credentials
3. On 2FA screen enter backup code instead of TOTP
Expected Result: User is logged in, backup code is consumed

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /forgot-password
2. Enter registered email
3. Click Send Reset Link
4. Check email for reset link
5. Click link and set new password
Expected Result: Password is reset successfully, user can login with new password

Test Steps:
1. Click user menu dropdown
2. Click Logout
Expected Result: User is logged out, redirected to home page

Test Steps:
1. Go to Dashboard > Security tab
2. Click Enable 2FA
3. Scan QR code with authenticator app
4. Enter verification code
5. Save backup codes
Expected Result: 2FA is enabled, backup codes are displayed

Pre-conditions: User is logged in with 2FA enabled
Test Steps:
1. Go to Dashboard > Security tab
2. Click Disable 2FA
3. Enter password and current TOTP code
4. Confirm
Expected Result: 2FA is disabled

Test Steps:
1. Go to /verify-email
2. Click Resend Verification Email
3. Check email inbox
Expected Result: New verification email is sent

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /video/
2. Scroll through videos
Expected Result: Videos display in TikTok-style full-screen format with swipe navigation

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to any video
2. Observe video player
Expected Result: Video starts playing automatically

Test Steps:
1. Click on video to pause
2. Click again to resume
Expected Result: Video toggles between play and pause

Test Steps:
1. Click PiP button on video player
2. Navigate to another page
Expected Result: Video continues playing in floating PiP window

Test Scenario: Verify video upload with valid file
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /upload
2. Select video file (MP4 under 100MB)
3. Enter title and description
4. Select category
5. Click Upload
Expected Result: Video is uploaded successfully, appears in moderation queue

1. Navigate to /upload
2. Try to upload video over 100MB
Expected Result: Error message about file size limit

Test Scenario: Verify upload fails with invalid format
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /upload
2. Try to upload non-video file
Expected Result: Error message about invalid file format

1. Navigate to liked video
2. Click the heart/like button again
Expected Result: Like count decreases, button returns to unliked state
